price: 16. Waxay (munaafiqiintu) ka dhigteen dhaarahooda gaashaan (ay isku qariyaan) markaasay ka weeciyeen (dadka) jidka Alle, sidaas awgeed waxay leeyihiin cadaab dufeysa.
arabic: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ittakhadhū aymānahum junnatan faṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi falahum ʿadhābun muhīnun
